net.hockeyapp.android
Class UpdateManagerListener

java.lang.Object
  net.hockeyapp.android.StringListener
      net.hockeyapp.android.UpdateManagerListener

public abstract class UpdateManagerListener
extends StringListener

Description

Abstract class for callbacks to be invoked from the UpdateManager.

getExpiryDate

public java.util.Date getExpiryDate()
Return an expiry date for this build or null. After this date the build will be blocked by a dialog.

onBuildExpired

public boolean onBuildExpired()
Called when the build is expired. Return false to if you handle the expiry in your code.
